short_summary: Procurement for Supply Arrangement under RFSA
description: Providing Enclosed Trailer and related items
full_summary:
# Tender Notice: Enclosed Trailer for DND Headquarters
## Information
* **Reference Number:** cb-7775-74187581
* **Tender Reference Number:** W8476-246756/A
* **Solicitation Number:** W8476-246756/ A
* **Publication Date:** August 14, 2023
* **Closing Date and Time:** September 5, 2023, 2 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start/End Dates:** To be determined
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence Headquarters
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category (GD)**
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Notice Type (RFP):** Request for Proposal against Supply Arrangement
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Bid Submission Details

* Bidders must have a Pre-qualified supplier status under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-19TRLR. Interested suppliers can refer to the following link: [link](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HP-923-76996).
* Documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Required Goods
The Department of National Defence requires Qty eleven (11) enclosed trailers to meet the following specifications:

* Compliance: Supply Arrangement E60HP-19TRLR/HP Configuration 4, 6, 9, 11, 14
* Delivery date: 120 days after receipt of order (ARO)

## Contact Information

* **Contact Person:** Dong Le
* **Email Address:** dong.le@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone Number:** (999) 999-9999

Please note: The information provided in this tender notice becomes part of the tender documentation. It is your responsibility to verify the details before submitting your proposal. You are also responsible for ensuring compliance with all requirements and specifications outlined in the tender documentation. By participating in this tender process, you acknowledge that you have done your due diligence. The Department of National Defence reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers and reserves the right to cancel the procurement process
